name: HKSampleType
desc: An abstract superclass for all classes that identify a specific type of sample when working with the HealthKit store.

items.name: var isMinimumDurationRestricted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether samples of this type have a minimum time interval between the start and end dates.

items.name: var minimumAllowedDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The minimum duration if the sample type has a restricted duration.

items.name: var isMaximumDurationRestricted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether samples of this type have a maximum time interval between the start and end dates.

items.name: var maximumAllowedDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The maximum duration if the sample type has a restricted duration.

items.name: var allowsRecalibrationForEstimates: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether HealthKit supports recalibrating the prediction algorithm used to produce estimates for this sample type.
